description: Airdrops at the moment are very expensive. We aim to make them cheaper by utilising merkle trees/root and merkle proofs. It makes the airdrops multiple times cheaper. This project is a follow-up on an existing pull request to Polkadot SDK.

High-resolution location proofs with TLSNotary allow users to prove their geolocation over time while maintaining privacy. By leveraging internet security and Google's data, Alibi lets users with a Google account prove their historical location without revealing unnecessary information, bridging Web2 and Web3.
milestones: more research needed for next milestone

description: Anytype Spaces are currently like Communities. You can Join spaces, share links, etc. You can Collaborate together - write docs, chat, etc. Let's add more Web3 SOCIAL FEATURES: add NFT token gating to the Anytype. If someone has a required NFT -> he can join the space.
Visualise and track transactions of a wallet address in a human-readable format.
ChatPay is a Telegram Mini App that brings decentralization to data acquisition for the common good, allowing users to sell their data instead of having it taken by large platforms.

Clima Compass is a gamified Web3 platform that incentivizes users to make predictions about global climate metrics. By rewarding accurate forecasts, it aims to increase climate awareness, gather valuable data insights, and foster positive environmental impact through partnerships and financial contributions.
techStack: Rootstock, Cere Network, Sepolia Testnet, Goldsky Subgraph, SQL, Nextjs, Langchain

description: CodeKarma - A CLI tool to check that the code you write aligns with your values written in your manifesto.
Crypto Knight is a revolutionary platform designed to simplify your crypto investments. With Crypto Knight, you can invest in decentralized index funds managed by smart contracts.
The Blocklicense is a web3 content licensing registry and relicensing marketplace for text-based journalistic content.
Increasing participation turnout is key to decentralized governance. Delegit is a 2-click flow to delegate on Polkadot.
DePHY Access is a dApp that facilitates user access to decentralized resources in the DePIN sector, like GPU rentals and decentralized cloud computing.
techStack: Ollama, EVM Pallet, dephy messaging layer, DePHY ID, Solidity

description: The network accepts causal models uploaded by users. Those are then tested against observations in the network and scored by surprise. The lowest surprise model is the consensus model.

Dot Takeout is the ultimate tax reporting tool for the Polkadot ecosystem. By aggregating data across all Polkadot chains, Dot Takeout provides users with a comprehensive, automated report of all transactions.
Empathy Technologies is a project that aims to optimize knowledge transfer and collaboration across diverse fields by mapping and translating complex information into user-specific contexts.

Helixstreet is building the future of life sciences and healthcare in the Web3 world. This hack session brought us closer to that vision, creating a flexible parathread pay-as-you-go blockchain foundation.

projectName: How to manage a Smart Co-working via Polkadot OpenGov
description: This project demonstrates how, with the help of the large Polkadot OpenGov community, we can manage access to a shared coworking space.
Hypertents achieves cross-chain intent settling using Hyperbridge as the bridging layer.
This defines a series of intents, a routing system that uniquely identifies one action to be performed, which can be implemented by dApps or extensions.
Our platform empowers retail investors to capitalize on the rising market values of football players, enabling them to capture significant growth.
techStack: Backend Solidity, Front end Wagmi & VIEM

description: Propcorn is a public good designed to incentivize open-source developers by enabling micro-funding for small features or fixes on GitHub.
milestones: Revamped UI, overhaul Smart Contract, and ready to GO LIVE

description: QSTN is a self-service AI-powered survey marketplace that allows businesses to fund surveys using Solana tokens and Solana NFTs, rewarding participants while ensuring user consent via zero-knowledge proofs.
Raitify makes information about AI agents explicit and transparent, allowing agents to become visible and reputable so users can find the right models to advance their work.

Our platform empowers communities by providing decentralized social networks with seamless Web3 interoperability, where each community operates on its own Kusama parachain with custom tokens and shared governance through $LOVE.
techStack: Microservices architecture Backend: Java or Rust, Frontend: React Native or Flutter, PostgreSQL or Mongo, Web3.js, Polkadot SDK, Livepeer and more integrations

description: We present the integration of the Solana Virtual Machine as a pallet into a Substrate runtime, allowing developers to spin up Polkadot parachains and substrate-based chains compatible with the Solana stack.
techStack: Solana / SVM repository, Polkadot SDK / Substrate

description: StarknetMeetups is a decentralized event management infrastructure built on StarkNet, where each event is represented by a custom smart contract.
Authentication of e-mail attachments using blockchain technology.
techStack: React, Vite, Wagmi, Viem, TypeScript, Solidity, Hardhat, Sepolia Testnet

description: Web 3bune is a protocol to create and distribute token-gated news. Our goal is to realign incentives between journalists and platforms through micro transactions.
techStack: JavaScript, Solidity, Hardhat, Farcaster Frames, Kiwi News

description: We are building a robot for an Interactive Robot Art Installation, where robots are drawing on a canvas while driving, controlled by AI and humans. A user connects their wallet to buy a control token and take control over the robot.
techStack: Jetson Nano, Rust, HTML, JS, CSS, NMKR Api
